name: FLYING SNAKE

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The snake doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

raw_text:
AC 14 	Initiative +2 (12)
HP 5 (2d4)
Speed 30 ft., Fly 60 ft., Swim 30 ft.
MOD 	SAVE
STR 	4 	−3 	−3
DEX 	15 	+2 	+2
CON 	11 	+0 	+0
MOD 	SAVE
INT 	2 	−4 	−4
WIS 	12 	+1 	+1
CHA 	5 	−3 	−3
Senses Blindsight 10 ft.; Passive Perception 11
Languages None
CR 1/8 (XP 25; PB +2)
Traits
Flyby. The snake doesn’t provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an
enemy’s reach.
Tiny Monstrosity, Unaligned
